reasoning: The method is short and uses a clear ternary to guard division and return a double. It is fairly readable. Potential issues: if getJaca and getEspinafre return int, the division is integer division and may truncate results; also getEspinafre is evaluated twice. Casting to double or caching values would improve clarity.

reasoning: Codigo com leitura de dificuldade devido a nomes de variaveis pouco descriptivos e loops complexos. O algoritmo lembra o Luhn, mas sem comentarios e com indexacao confusa. O retorno final 10 - s % 10 pode ser incorreto quando s%10 == 0 e entradas vazias ou nulas podem produzir resultados inesperados.

reasoning: Readable leap year check with correct logic. The if/else is redundant because the return value is already a boolean. Consider simplifying to return (a % 4 == 0 && a % 100 != 0) || (a % 400 == 0); and rename a to year and isAB to isLeapYear for clarity.

Overall clear and easy to follow.

The intent to update totals and min/max from pimenta is clear, but missing context and non standard field usage hurts comprehension.
